ISA.name: Interchange Control Header
ISA.description: To start and identify an interchange of zero or more functional groups and interchange-related control segments.

valid_codes.description: No Authorization Information Present (No Meaningful Information in I02)
No Security Information Present (No Meaningful Information in I04)
Carrier Identification Code as assigned by Health Care Financing Administration (HCFA)

Medicare Provider and Supplier Identification Number as assigned by Health Care Financing Administration (HCFA)

GS.name: Functional Group Header
GS.description: To indicate the beginning of a functional group and to provide control information.

ST.name: Transaction Set Header
ST.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and assign a control number.

BHT.name: Beginning of Hierarchical Transaction
BHT.description: To indicate the beginning of a hierarchical transaction and provide reference information such as transaction set purpose, creation date and time, and claim or encounter identifier.

valid_codes.description: Original - Refers to original transmissions which have never been sent to the receiver.
Reissue - Indicates the transmission has been previously sent and is being retransmitted due to disruption.
Subrogation Demand - For use by state Medicaid agencies performing post-payment recovery claiming with willing trading partners.
Chargeable - Transaction contains only fee-for-service claims or claims with at least one chargeable line item.
Reporting - Transaction contains only capitated encounters or is sent to an entity for purposes other than adjudication of a claim.

NM1.name: Individual or Organizational Name
NM1.description: Segment to identify individuals or organizations involved in the transaction.

elements.name: Entity Identifier Code
elements.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property, or an individual.

elements.name: Entity Type Qualifier
elements.description: Code qualifying the type of entity.

elements.name: Entity Last Name or Organization Name
elements.description: Individual last name or organizational name.

elements.name: Entity First Name
elements.description: Individual first name.

elements.name: Entity Middle Name or Initial
elements.description: Individual middle name or initial.

elements.name: Entity Name Prefix
elements.description: Prefix to individual name (e.g., Jr., Sr.).

elements.name: Entity Name Suffix
elements.description: Suffix to individual name (e.g., Dr., Mr., Ms.).

elements.name: Identification Code Qualifier
elements.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (NM1-09).

elements.name: Identification Code
elements.description: Code identifying a party or other code.

PER.name: Administrative Communications Contact
PER.description: Provides contact information for the billing provider, including communication numbers for administrative communications regarding billing.

elements.name: Contact Function Code
elements.description: Code identifying the major duty or responsibility of the person or group named.

elements.name: Name
elements.description: Free-form name of the contact person or office.

elements.name: Communication Number Qualifier
elements.description: Code identifying the type of communication number provided.

elements.name: Communication Number
elements.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable.

elements.name: Communication Number Qualifier
elements.description: Code identifying the type of communication number.

elements.name: Communication Number
elements.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable.

elements.name: Communication Number Qualifier
elements.description: Code identifying the type of communication number.

elements.name: Communication Number
elements.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable.

HL.name: Hierarchical Level
HL.description: The HL segment is used to identify dependencies among related data segments and establish a hierarchical structure within a transaction set.

elements.name: Hierarchical ID Number
elements.description: A unique number assigned by the sender to identify a particular data segment in a hierarchical structure.

elements.name: Hierarchical Parent ID Number
elements.description: Identification number of the next higher hierarchical data segment that the data segment being described is subordinate to.

elements.name: Hierarchical Level Code
elements.description: Code defining the characteristic of a level in a hierarchical structure.

elements.name: Hierarchical Child Code
elements.description: Indicates whether there are subordinate HL segments related to the current segment.

PRV.name: Provider Information
PRV.description: Segment to specify provider type, taxonomy, and specialty information.

elements.name: Provider Code
elements.description: Code indicating the type of provider.

elements.name: Provider Code Qualifier
elements.description: Qualifier for the provider code.

elements.name: Provider Specialty
elements.description: Provider taxonomy classification code.

CUR.name: Currency
CUR.description: Specifies foreign currency information relevant to the transaction.

elements.name: Entity Identifier Code
elements.description: Code identifying an Organization Entity, a physical location, property or an individual

elements.name: Currency Code
elements.description: Code for country in whose currency the charges are specified

N3.name: Party Location
N3.description: To specify the address of the named party involved in the transaction.

elements.name: Address Information
elements.description: Address information

elements.name: Address Information
elements.description: Address information

N4.name: Geographic Location
N4.description: Specifies the geographic place of the named party, including city, state, postal code, and country.

elements.name: City Name
elements.description: Free-form text for the city name.

elements.name: State or Province Code
elements.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency.

elements.name: Postal Code
elements.description: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for the United States).

elements.name: Country Code
elements.description: Code identifying the country.

elements.name: Location Qualifier
elements.description: Code identifying the type of location.

elements.name: Location Identifier
elements.description: Code which identifies a specific location.

elements.name: Country Subdivision Code
elements.description: Code identifying the country subdivision.

elements.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
elements.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

elements.name: Reference Identification
elements.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

SBR.name: Subscriber Information
SBR.description: To record information specific to the primary insured and the insurance carrier for that insured.

valid_codes.description: Medicare Secondary Working Aged Beneficiary or Spouse with Employer Group Health Plan
Medicare Secondary End-Stage Renal Disease Beneficiary in the Mandated Coordination Period with an Employer's Group Health Plan
Medicare Secondary, No-fault Insurance including Auto is Primary
Medicare Secondary Public Health Service (PHS)or Other Federal Agency
Medicare Secondary Disabled Beneficiary Under Age 65 with Large Group Health Plan (LGHP)
Medicare Secondary, Other Liability Insurance is Primary

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code

CLM.name: Claim Information
CLM.description: To specify basic data about the claim.

valid_codes.description: Place of Service Codes for Professional or Dental Services
Assignment Accepted on Clinical Lab Services Only
Yes, Provider has a Signed Statement Permitting Release of Medical Billing Data Related to a Claim
Informed Consent to Release Medical Information for Conditions or Diagnoses Regulated by Federal Statutes
Signature generated by provider because the patient was not physically present for services
Proof of Eligibility Unknown or Unavailable
Delay in Delivery of Custom-made Appliances
Original Claim Rejected or Denied Due to a Reason Unrelated to the Billing Limitation Rules
Administration Delay in the Prior Approval Process

DTP.name: Date or Time or Period
DTP.description: To specify any or all of a date, a time, or a time period.

valid_codes.description: Range of Dates Expressed in Format CCYYMMDD-CCYYMMDD

rules.description: If format is D8, the date value must be in CCYYMMDD format and have a length of 8.
If format is RD8, the date range must be in CCYYMMDD-CCYYMMDD format and have a length of 17.

PWK.name: Claim Supplemental Information
PWK.description: To identify the type or transmission or both of paperwork or supporting information.

valid_codes.description: Available on Request at Provider Site

rules.description: If either PWK05 or PWK06 is present, then the other is required.

CN1.name: Contract Information
CN1.description: To specify basic data about the contract or contract line item.

AMT.name: Patient Amount Paid
AMT.description: To indicate the total monetary amount.

K3.name: File Information
K3.description: To transmit a fixed-format record or matrix contents.

NTE.name: Claim Note
NTE.description: To transmit information in a free-form format, if necessary, for comment or special instruction.

valid_codes.description: Goals, Rehabilitation Potential, or Discharge Plans

CR1.name: Ambulance Transport Information
CR1.description: To supply information related to the ambulance service rendered to a patient.

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code

valid_codes.description: Patient was transported to nearest facility for care of symptoms, complaints, or both
Patient was transported for the benefit of a preferred physician
Patient was transported for the nearness of family members
Patient was transported for the care of a specialist or for availability of specialized equipment

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code

rules.description: If either Patient Weight (CR102) or its unit (CR101) is present, then both are required.

CR2.name: Spinal Manipulation Service Information
CR2.description: To supply information related to the chiropractic service rendered to a patient.

valid_codes.description: Acute Manifestation of a Chronic Condition

HI.name: Health Care Information
HI.description: To supply information related to the delivery of health care using an industry-standard code list.

HCP.name: Claim Pricing/Repricing Information
HCP.description: To specify pricing or repricing information about a health care claim or line item.

valid_codes.description: Priced at the Standard Fee Schedule

elements.name: Repricing Per Diem or Flat Rate Amount
Repriced Approved Ambulatory Patient Group Code
Repriced Approved Ambulatory Patient Group Amount

valid_codes.description: Cannot Identify Provider as TPO (Third Party Organization) Participant
Cannot Identify Payer as TPO (Third Party Organization) Participant
Cannot Identify Insured as TPO (Third Party Organization) Participant
Claim does not contain enough information for re-pricing
Not Followed - Call Not Made (Non-Compliance Call Not Made)
Non-Network Professional Provider in Network Hospital
Services or Specialist not in Network

CAS.name: Claim Level Adjustments
CAS.description: To supply adjustment reason codes and amounts as needed for an entire claim or for a particular service within the claim being paid.

OI.name: Other Insurance Coverage Information
OI.description: To specify information associated with other health insurance coverage.

valid_codes.description: Signature generated by provider because the patient was not physically present for services
Informed Consent to Release Medical Information for Conditions or Diagnoses Regulated by Federal Statutes

MOA.name: Outpatient Adjudication Information
MOA.description: To convey claim-level data related to the adjudication of Medicare claims not related to an inpatient setting.

elements.name: End Stage Renal Disease Payment Amount

LX.name: Service Line Number
LX.description: To reference a line number in a transaction set.

SV1.name: Professional Service
SV1.description: To specify the service line item detail for a health care professional.

valid_codes.description: Jurisdiction Specific Procedure and Supply Codes
Home Infusion EDI Coalition (HIEC) Product/Service Code

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code

SV5.name: Durable Medical Equipment Service
SV5.description: To specify the claim service detail for durable medical equipment.

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code

rules.description: If Rental Unit Price Indicator (SV506) is present, then DME Rental Price (SV504) is required.

CR3.name: Durable Medical Equipment Certification
CR3.description: To supply information regarding a physician's certification for durable medical equipment.

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code

MEA.name: Test Result
MEA.description: To specify physical measurements or counts, including dimensions, tolerances, variances, and weights.

PS1.name: Purchased Service Information
PS1.description: To specify the information about services that are purchased.

LIN.name: Drug Identification
LIN.description: To specify basic item identification data.

elements.name: National Drug Code or Universal Product Number

SVD.name: Line Adjudication Information
SVD.description: To convey service line adjudication information for coordination of benefits.

valid_codes.description: CMS/DMERC Certificate of Medical Necessity (CMN) Forms

rules.description: If Code List Qualifier Code (LQ01) is present, then Form Identifier (LQ02) is required.

FRM.name: Supporting Documentation
FRM.description: To specify information in response to a codified questionnaire document.

rules.description: At least one of the Question Response elements (FRM02, FRM03, FRM04, or FRM05) must be present.

SE.name: Transaction Set Trailer
SE.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments.

GE.name: Functional Group Trailer
GE.description: To indicate the end of a functional group and to provide control information.

IEA.name: Interchange Control Trailer
IEA.description: To define the end of an interchange of zero or more functional groups and interchange-related control segments.
